entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @paimadhu @cugartegil @JacobBigio @ThePrintIndia @sandygrains @doctorsoumya @VidyaKrishnan @AnantBhan @GHS @picardonhealth @DrSenait @suchitrav @AnooBhu @EpiEllie @nataliexdean I would add the impact of COVID-19 pandemic on mental health, mainly in Low- and Middle- Income Countries(LMICs)  where there are high treatment gaps, lack of access to mental health services and lack of human resources.
